text: @NYGovCuomo Wake up Governor Cuomo! Your executive order requiring nursing homes to take Covid-19 infected patients killed way too many seniors and caused the NY Covid-19 death rate to sore. And yet, Governor Cuomo takes no accountability. Topical Liberal Democrat. Blame everyone else!
